name: Complete UX Research KIT
description:
What Is User Research?

The methodical analysis of your users in order to gain insights that will inform the design process is known as user experience research. You'll utilize a variety of user research approaches to learn about your users' wants, attitudes, pain points, and behaviors (task analyses, for example, look at how people really navigate the product experience, not simply how they should or say they do).


Why is the UX research process important?

So what exactly is the value of user experience research? After all, you understand your business and its workings better than anyone. How can uninformed external users help you learn more?

In fact, the fresh perspective of your end-users is exactly why UX research is so valuable. Because they’re not already immersed in your language, processes and systems, user testing participants are in the best position to help you see where things might be confusing to a newcomer who isn’t involved with your business.


What's inside the file?

  1. Recruit Interview Participants
  2. Interview Transcripts
  3. Empathy Map
  4. User Persona
  5. User Stories
  6. User Journey Map
  7. User Flow
  8. Problem/Hypothesis Statement
  9. Value Proposition
  10. Competitive Audit
  11. Crazy 8's


Am I available for help and support?

Yes, of course. I'm working on this file because there's a need in my heart for it, a passion for it, and a want to see it grow in usefulness. If you have any problems, suggestions, or questions, please contact me at shawnmahbu.ux@gmail.com
